description: Creates a voice profile domain, a collection of voice profiles, their voice prints, and encrypted enrollment audio. For more information about voice profile domains, see Using Amazon Chime SDK Voice Analytics in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the voice profile domain.

parameters.name: ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration
parameters.description: The server-side encryption configuration for the request. The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the enrollment data in a voice profile domain. Asymmetric customer managed keys are not supported.

nested_params.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the enrollment data in a voice profile domain. Asymmetric customer managed keys are not supported.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the domain. (dict) --- Describes a tag applied to a resource. The tag's key. The tag's value.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainArn
nested_items.description: The voice profile domain's Amazon Resource Number (ARN).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration settings for server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the enrollment data in a voice profile domain. Asymmetric customer managed keys are not supported.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile domain was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile was last updated.
